docs.title: About
docs.text:
Ragas is a Python library for evaluating and improving your LLM applications.

Ragas is designed to be simple to use, yet powerful. It provides a set of tools to evaluate and improve your LLM applications.

Ragas is designed to be simple to use, yet powerful. It provides a set of tools to evaluate and improve your LLM applications.

In [1]: Copied! 
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

# Generate some data
x = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]
y = [2, 4, 6, 8, 10]

# Create a linear plot
plt.plot(x, y)

# Add labels and title
plt.xlabel('X-axis')
plt.ylabel('Y-axis')
plt.title('Linear Plot')

# Display the plot
plt.show()

y = [2, 4, 6, 8, 10]

# Display the plot

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt # Generate some data x = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5] y = [2, 4, 6, 8, 10] # Create a linear plot plt.plot(x, y) # Add labels and title plt.xlabel('X-axis') plt.ylabel('Y-axis') plt.title('Linear Plot') # Display the plot plt.show()

docs.title: This is a test of markdown in mkdocs¶
Class
docs.text:
Bases: BaseModel

Represents a class in the school system.

This class inherits from pydantic's BaseModel for data validation.

Attributes:

Name Type Description name str

The name of the class.

teacher Teacher

The teacher responsible for this class.

class_code str

A unique code identifying the class.

Note

The 'teacher' attribute is a forward reference to the Teacher class.

Source code in ragasdocs/module1.py 
class Class(BaseModel):
    """
    Represents a class in the school system.

    This class inherits from pydantic's BaseModel for data validation.

    Attributes:
        name (str): The name of the class.
        teacher (Teacher): The teacher responsible for this class.
        class_code (str): A unique code identifying the class.

    Note:
        The 'teacher' attribute is a forward reference to the Teacher class.
    """
    name: str
    teacher: "Teacher"
    class_code: str

docs.title: School dataclass
docs.text:
Represents a school in the educational system.

This class encapsulates the core components of a school, including its teachers, students, and classes.

Attributes:

Name Type Description teachers List[Teacher]

A list of Teacher objects representing all teachers in the school.

students List[Student]

A list of Student objects representing all students enrolled in the school.

classes List[Class]

A list of Class objects representing all classes offered by the school.

Note

This class is implemented as a dataclass for automatic generation of init, repr, and other special methods.

Source code in ragasdocs/module1.py 
@dataclass
class School:
    """
    Represents a school in the educational system.

    This class encapsulates the core components of a school, including its teachers,
    students, and classes.

    Attributes:
        teachers (List[Teacher]): A list of Teacher objects representing all teachers in the school.
        students (List[Student]): A list of Student objects representing all students enrolled in the school.
        classes (List[Class]): A list of Class objects representing all classes offered by the school.

    Note:
        This class is implemented as a dataclass for automatic generation of 
        __init__, __repr__, and other special methods.
    """
    teachers: t.List[Teacher]
    students: t.List[Student]
    classes: t.List[Class]

    def get_classes_student_attends(self, student: Student):
        """
        Return the classes a student attends.

        Parameters
        ----------
        student : Student
            The student object for whom to retrieve the classes.

        Returns
        -------
        list of Class
            A list of Class objects that the student attends.

        Notes
        -----
        This method filters the school's classes based on the class codes
        associated with the given student.
        """
        return [c for c in self.classes if c.class_code in student.classes]

docs.title: Parameters
docs.text: student : Student The student object for whom to retrieve the classes.

docs.title: Returns
docs.text: list of Class A list of Class objects that the student attends.

docs.title: Notes
docs.text:
This method filters the school's classes based on the class codes associated with the given student.

Source code in ragasdocs/module1.py 
def get_classes_student_attends(self, student: Student):
    """
    Return the classes a student attends.

    Parameters
    ----------
    student : Student
        The student object for whom to retrieve the classes.

    Returns
    -------
    list of Class
        A list of Class objects that the student attends.

    Notes
    -----
    This method filters the school's classes based on the class codes
    associated with the given student.
    """
    return [c for c in self.classes if c.class_code in student.classes]

docs.title: Student
docs.text:
Bases: BaseModel

Represents a student in the school system.

This class inherits from pydantic's BaseModel for data validation.

Attributes:

Name Type Description name str

The name of the student.

classes List[str]

A list of class codes that the student is enrolled in.

class_teacher Teacher

The class teacher assigned to this student.

Note

The 'class_teacher' attribute is a forward reference to the Teacher class. The 'classes' attribute contains class codes rather than Class objects.

Source code in ragasdocs/module1.py 
class Student(BaseModel):
    """
    Represents a student in the school system.

    This class inherits from pydantic's BaseModel for data validation.

    Attributes:
        name (str): The name of the student.
        classes (List[str]): A list of class codes that the student is enrolled in.
        class_teacher (Teacher): The class teacher assigned to this student.

    Note:
        The 'class_teacher' attribute is a forward reference to the Teacher class.
        The 'classes' attribute contains class codes rather than Class objects.
    """
    name: str
    classes: t.List[str]
    class_teacher: "Teacher"

docs.title: Teacher
docs.text:
Bases: BaseModel

Represents a teacher in the school system.

Attributes:

Name Type Description name str

The name of the teacher.

classes List[Class]

A list of Class objects that the teacher is responsible for.

Note

This class inherits from pydantic's BaseModel for data validation.

Source code in ragasdocs/module1.py 
class Teacher(BaseModel):
    """
    Represents a teacher in the school system.

    Attributes:
        name (str): The name of the teacher.
        classes (List[Class]): A list of Class objects that the teacher is responsible for.

    Note:
        This class inherits from pydantic's BaseModel for data validation.
    """
    name: str
    classes: t.List["Class"]

docs.title: Welcome to the Ragas Docs!
docs.text:
This site is dedicated to providing comprehensive documentation for the Ragas project. Here, you'll find detailed information about the project, its features, and how to get the most out of it.

Now the main object here is School which is a dataclass.

from ragasdocs import School

school = School()
CC++ 
#include <stdio.h>

int main(void) {
  printf("Hello world!\n");
  return 0;
}

#include <iostream>

int main(void) {
  std::cout << "Hello world!" << std::endl;
  return 0;
}
